description:
Ryou Mizushima enrolls in junior high and joins the badminton club with great vigor. Although the club didn't have a proper coach, Mizushima improved his skills with his own physical strength by the time he participated in the prefectural tournament. Afterwards, he is approached by the Yokohama Minato High School's badminton coach, Ebihara. Indecisive and timid, Mizushima hesitates to attend such a prestigious school. However, with his elder sister Rika giving him a strong push, he decides to go to Yokohama Minato. Now blessed with a coach and idiosyncratic teammates, Mizushima will gain experience he's lacked till now, and aims to win the inter-high tournament.

(Source: Bilibili TV)

node.description:
**[Website](http://iris-in.com/)**

**Birthplace:** Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan

**Irie Shingo** is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

__Alma Mater:__ Toyo University

__[Website](https://www.yukihayashi.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayayu1231)__

__Introduction:__
Yuuki Hayashi is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor, who used to be a rhythmic gymnast

__Biography:__
His history in music began in university when he started creating music pieces for rhythmic gymnasts as a hobby for 5000 yen a piece. When he started getting requests from other universities for his music, his interest in music producing grew. After graduation, he was taught music for 6 months by a rhythmic gymnastics music producer, and now, he handles music for various sports. He also arranges music for dance, athletic competitions, companies, independent movies and recently, TV dramas and anime.

(Source: MyAnimeList, edited)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._

name.native: スコット・マクドナルド

node.description: Yasukazu Shouji is an animator currently working at animation studio OLM.

_Note: Not to be confused with Director [Ryouta Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/142412/Ryouta-Itou)._

Ryouta Itou is a CG Artist who mostly does work for OLM Digital.

[Official Website](https://longman.jp/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/longman-sawa/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/longman_asp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/longman_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9xknarRMM6OfxkIUa2kT_A)

Japanese punk rock band. 

__Members:__
• Sawa Yoriki (さわ, 頼木佐和) - vocals, bass
• Hiroya Hirai (ひらい, 平井博也) - guitar, vocals
• Yuuki Horikawa (ほりほり, 堀川雄己) - drums, chorus

A nine-member Japanese boy band under the talent agency Johnny & Associates. The group is split into two sub-groups: Hey! Say! 7 (which composed of the younger members) and Hey! Say! BEST (the older members). 

Hey! Say! JUMP originally debuted with ten members, the largest group in Johnny's history. But in 2011, Ryutaro Morimoto was indefinitely suspended from the group following an underage smoking scandal. Hey! Say! JUMP is considered an expansion of the temporary group Hey! Say! 7. The name Hey! Say! refers to the fact that all the members were born in the Heisei period and JUMP is an acronym for Johnny's Ultra Music Power. 

(Source: Wikipedia)
